inn1.comm: inauspicious start for Mashrafe. On a length and outside off, ignored. No-ball called, he is caught over stepping
shortish and outside off, Azhar cashes in. He executes a front-full pull over midwicket

a big appeal for lbw, not given. This was fuller and outside off, he takes a step forward and shuffles across off, he misses the attempted flick. Struck miles outside off, that hardly threatened off. They chat about a referral and decide against it
on a good length and around off, he hangs back and defends it to the off side
Mashrafe ambles in and delivers a good length ball on off, he inches forward and blocks it solidly
fullish and homing in on off, patted in front of point with an open face
back of a length around off, Azhar hangs back and punches it to the right of mid-on
back of a length, top-of-off line, punched to point
similar length angled in, he blocks it in front of square leg with a closed bat-face
fullish and outside off, he leans forward and pushes it firmly into the covers. Good, confident stride forward
back of a length, Taskin explores the channel outside off, he hoists his bat above the shoulder and lets it pass
back of a length, attacking top of off, Azhar shuffles across a touch and blocks it to mid-on
veering onto the pads, clipped away to square leg
fuller and outside off, Sarfraz shuffles across first ball and flicks it to the right of mid-on. The fielder dives and makes a half-stop
fuller and on middle and leg, turned towards midwicket
on a length and outside off, guided past backward point with an angled blade. Deep third man runs across to his right and cuts it off
back of a length and shaping away outside off, he looks to guide it away. Off a thick outside edge down to third man
77.3mph, back of a length and close to off, tucks Azhar up for room. Steered to point
pitched further up and outside off, he leans forward and lays into a good-looking drive but does not get the placement right. Finds the fielder at extra-cover
Sarfraz rides the bounce of this shortish ball outside off and glides it to deep third man
pitched up and just a shade outside off, driven straight to the man at point
dragged shortish and width on offer as well, Azhar cracks it to backward point. He can't thread the gap, again
86.2mph, banged in short and rises outside off, he leaps off his feet and aims to ramp it over slip. Beaten. Wide called
back of a length and slanted across off, no shot offered
back of a length and on off, mis-hit flick between midwicket and mid-on for one
shortish and outside off, Sarfraz steps out, Taskin is wary of it as he drags his length back. Sarfraz is hurried onto the pull, mis-times it as it goes only as far as mid-on
Mashrafe Mortaza ventures wide of the crease and explores the channel outside off. This holds its line and beats the nervy little push of Azhar
fuller and on middle and leg, clipped away to the left of short midwicket, and to the right of mid-on. Mominul chases, slides and limits it to three
on a length and outside off, pushed to point
Sarfraz shuffles across, takes a step forward. Aims for a big slog-sweep but does not connect. He wears it on his shoulder as the ball dribbles in front of point
Sarfraz shuffles across and whips this length ball behind square on the leg-side for one
dug in short and outside off, sits up to hit. Azhar Ali obliges as he cuts it away in the gap through the covers. Mashrafe did not have much pace to pose a threat

banged in short, bouncer hurries onto Sarfraz, who was batting outside of the crease, only manages a top-edge on the pull. Nasir (I guess) runs to his right from square leg, dives but the ball eludes his grasp
back of a length and outside off, punched to mid-off
fractionally back of a length and outside off, he stands tall and balanced as he punchily drives it between the covers and mid-off
back of a length, top-of-off line, punched to short cover
back of a length and outside off, Azhar hops up and cuts it through point, the ball fizzes away to the boundary. Beautifully played

Azhar has been pinged on the helmet! This was banged in short Taskin at 85.5mph, good bouncer, good response response. Azhar ducks belatedly and is struck on the helmet. The ball runs away towards cover
tossed up on off, he uses his feet, meets the pitch of the ball and flicks it in front of square on the leg side
shortish and outside off, cut straight to the covers. He should be kicking himself for not putting that way
Sunny gives this ample air, Azhar strides forward and drives it down to long-off
lobbed up outside off, eased down to long-off
pushed through on off, he uses his feet and drives it into the hands of short cover
Azhar reaps reward for positive intent. He nips down the track, meets the pitch of this fullish one and whips it away to the right of mid-on

And he strikes with his first ball. This was on a back of a length and zipping through outside off with some good extra bounce. Sarfraz is on the move as he pushes at it away from he body. Nicks it off, Sarkar flings to his right at slip and pouches it at wide slip. Then tumbles onto the ground.
back of a length and rises outside off, past the flashing blade of Hafeez. His cut has been messed up by the extra lift there. Rubel is hitting the deck hard
on a good length and outside off, ignored
shortish and outside off, Hafeez hops up, goes on the back foot and quells it in front of point
back of a length and outside off, Hafeez flashes and is beaten soundly again. He does not meet with the cut shot
good length ball outside off, pushed to mid-off. That rounds off a wicket-maiden from Rubel
dropped short and wide outside off, cut to point
tossed up outside off on a back of a length, punched out to extra-cover
pushed to Mashrafe at short mid-off
fuller and on middle and leg, clipped to mid-on
he uses his feet, manufactures a very full ball, drills it hard into the ground. It bounces over Mashrafe at short mid-off

The middle stump has been pegged back and Sunny exults as Hafeez perishes for a duck. This was the arm-ball, slides in with the angle at 86.6ks and skids through. Hafeez is crease-bound and brings his bat down late. Timber!
on a back of a length and outside off, left alone
dug in shortish and rushes onto Azhar outside off, punchily blocked back to the bowler
shortish and tucks up the batsman for room, defended
on a back of a length and outside off, this one keeps low and slides under the flashing blade of Azhar
wide line outside off, Azhar lets it pass to the keeper
on a back of a length again, he hangs back, attempts a punch and mis-hits it to mid-on
drifting on the pads, nudged in front of square and Haris is off the mark
tossed up on off, tapped in front of the covers
pushed through on middle, very straight in line, he uses his feet and drives it down to long-off
flatter in trajectory and drifting down leg, Haris can't help it away and takes it on the pad
slid through on the pads, tucked behind square on the leg-side
shortish and spins across the off, he goes for a cut and gets a thick edge that lands in front of short third man
dug in on a back of a length and outside off, punched to point
bumper, he ducks under it. Wide called, for that was far too high
140.6ks, back of a length and on the hips, tucked away wide of mid-on
back of a length and outside off, he stands tall and punches it to the left of the covers. The fielder's dive amounts to nothing
back of a length and outside off, pushed towards gully with an angled bat
back of a length and on off, blocked back to the bowler
on the shorter side again, he hops up and clips a single behind square on the leg side
flatter and outside off, Haris punches it down to long-off
straight roller on middle, tucked out to midwicket
veering down leg, helped away towards deep backward square leg
fuller and slid through, worked to midwicket for one
flatter on the pads, flicked to square leg. That should have been put away
on a length and on middle, tucked to leg side for one
back of a length and around off, flicked away towards wide long-on for a couple
back of a length and comes in a touch from outside off, he attempts a feeble cut and manages an inside edge onto the pad
back of a length and around off, he looks to defend. The ball hits the bat as opposed to the bat hitting ball, rolls back to the bowler
on a length and outside off, driven towards sweeper cover via an open face
back of a length and pushed defensively to the covers

on a length and outside off, Haris presents the full face of the bat and drills a drive to the right of his captain, beats mid-off to his left. Nice high elbow on display as well. That should get Haris going
flatter and on off, he plays a whippy drive to long-on
tossed up on middle, Harris uses his feet and drives it back at the bowler
round-armish on middle, he backs away a bit and chops it in front of point
Nasir gives this more air, Haris he uses his feet and drives it to long-off
fuller and on off, down the track and pushed back at the bowler
fired flat and quick and on middle and off, he uses his feet and nearly yorks himself. Jabbed towards mid-off
looped up outside off, Haris inches forward and defends it to off
shortish and quick outside off, he hangs back and punches it to long-on

Brilliant catch from Mushfiq! This was pushed through outside off and turns away a bit. Azhar seeks to reverse-sweep it away and only manages to run it off the face to the right of Mushfiq, who anticipates well. The ball bobbled out on the first attempt, it hits his stomach and Mushfiq then hangs on to it on the rebound, clutching the ball against his body
quicker and outside off, strikes him on the back pad. Outside the line of off, not given
tossed up on off, he comes forward to smother it
fuller and on middle and leg, worked in front of mid-on
fuller and on middle, clipped in front of midwicket
Harris uses his feet and pushes it down towards long-on
straighter one from Nasir, he looks to push at it and takes it on the pad. Perhaps, snaking down leg
pushed towards mid-off

Fawad Alam bags a duck and leaves Pakistan in tatters at 59 for 4. This was flatter and quicker, comes in with the angle from round the stumps and skids on at 85.1ks. Fawad's bat came down at an angle, he misses the cut and the ball crashes into middle. Nasir lets out a big roar
low full toss, Rizwan whips his wrists and puts it away to the deep midwicket boundary
pushed through on the pads, tucked around the corner for one
slid through quick, arm-ball, defended to short leg off the back foot

looped up nicely outside off, spins away and draws the batsman out of the crease before beating the outside edge. Has he been stumped? Mushfiq was sharp again and took the bails off quickly. Is his back foot on the crease? Or is it in the air? The TV umpire examines from all possible angles. It is a tough call and the benefit of the doubt goes to Rizwan
flighted on off, he presses it back to the bowler
poked out past short leg off an inside edge. The throw from square leg is off-radar, but mid-off has it covered
pushed through quicker, dabbed gently to slip, on the bounce
fired on off, punchily blocked back
darted short and on off, punched down to long-on
fuller and on middle and leg, he uses his feet and whips it to leg
flat and quick, pushed to the right of the bowler
flat on middle, he skips out and nearly yorks himself, squeezed down to long-on for one
tossed up on middle, nudged in front of midwicket. Haris hunts for a single but has to retreat
arm-ball on off, blocked off the back foot
he uses his feet and flat-bats it now, beats mid-on to his left
Shakib gives this more air, defended
drifting onto the pads, worked to short fine. Diving save from the fielder
fired on off, pressed into the covers
fuller and darted in on off, blocked back to the bowler
pushed through on middle and leg, nudged through midwicket
looped up, blocked back to the bowler
on a good length and on middle and leg, blocked back to the bowler
drifting down leg, quicker. He sinks to one knee and misses the sweep
punched back at the bowler, who aims to reverse-flick it back onto the non-strikers' and misses. Haris was in though
he uses his feet and nearly yorks himself, leading edge in front of point
punched to the right of the bowler, towards long-on
whipped away to deep midwicket off the back foot
shortish and rises on middle, he backs away and cuts it to the covers, diving stop from the fielder

Rizwan has been pinned lbw. The forefinger goes up, he ponders over a review and decides against it. He starts walking off. This was pushed through, arm-ball, beats the inside edge of Rizwan on the defensive push. Trapped in front of off. He could have reviewed that as replays show that the impact was outside off
tossed up, blocked back to the bowler
slower through the air, dead-batted
shortish and punched to cover off the back foot
shortish and outside off, he backs away and punches it through the covers
tossed up around off, he pokes it towards third man off a thick outside edge
dragged short and wide outside off, punched to sweeper cover off the back foot
pushed through on off, blocked back to the bowler
slid through on off, punched to the covers off the back foot
darted down leg, wide called
shortish and spins in from outside off, he wears it high on the thigh pad
dabbed with soft hands wide of slip
fuller and on middle, dead-batted
flighted on middle, defended back to the bowler
dropped short and wide outside off, cut away strongly. He rocked back and connected well, beating backward point to his left
pushed through, blocked back to the bowler
veering on the hips, worked past leg slip for one
shortish and outside off, cut away to deep cover off the back foot
dug in on a shortish length, msitimed punch back to the bowler
slides on off, blocked to the left of the bowler off the back foot
slid through on middle and leg, defended to leg
pushed through on the leg stump, whipped away behind square
nice and loopy on of, Haris blocks it with a straight bat
shortish and outside off, he rocks back and punches it. Nasir dives across to his left at the covers and stops the ball
flighted on off, blocked back to the bowler
drifting down leg, he can't help it away. Off the pad to the left of Mishfiq
pushed through and spins in on off, defended back to the bowler
arm-ball on top of off, he backs away and guides it to point
darted on the pads, nudged behind square on the leg side for one
fuller and on middle, whippy drive back to the bowler
shortish on off, punched in front of mid-off off the back foot
pushed to the right of the bowler, Shakib dives across and deflects it towards long-on
tossed up and on middle, pushed back to the bowler
quicker and spins in, poked to the leg side
angled in full on middle, driven back at the bowler
back of a length and on off, punched towards mid-on
back of a length and on off, blocked in front of covers
shortish and hurries on off, blocked from the crease
banged in short and hurries onto Nasim, whop top-edges the ball attemped pull into the midwicket region
back of a length and on middle and leg, punched out to the right of midwicket
fuller and hurled in on middle and leg at 139ks, he jams it out towards midwicket
fuller and on middle and leg, whipped down to long-on
looped up on off, he comes forward and drives it to the right of short cover
short and wide outside off, mistimed cut, just wide of point as this had good bounce on it
tossed up and outside off, pushed to the off side
picked away off the pads behind square leg
flighted on off, he uses his feet and drives it back to the bowler, who dives and deflects it away towards where mid-off would have been
bumper  at 135.9ks, he ducks under it
back of a length and on middle, blocked back to the bowler
bouncer at 135.7ks, flies outside off to the keeper, he yanks his head out of the way
dug in short and rises outside off, he rises with it and punches it out to deep third man via an open face
banged in short and outside off, Haris stands tall and punches it past the covers. Sweeper mops it up in the deep
Rubel hunts for a yorker, this one is mighty full at the base of the leg stump. Nasim falls over the attempted flick and takes it on the pad, sliding down leg
flatter and on middle, Haris camps on the back foot and punches it back
tossed up outside off, full, he uses his feet and drives it to long-off
back of a length and outside off, punched to the covers
Nasim aims to come forward, the bowler drags his length back. Kept out from the crease
pushed through and on the leg stump, he can't help it away. Going down leg
he skips out and drives it down to long-on for one
good length ball around off, he employs an open face and guides it to point
good length ball on middle, worked to leg as he closes the face of the bat
banged in short, he pulls it to the right of midwicket, his dive ends in vain. It was not well-timed, though
back of a length and straighter in line, turned to midwicket
132.5ks, bouncer. Haris is forced to duck under it
back of a length and on the hips, picked away towards deep backward square leg
flatter and on middle and leg, punched down to long-on
tossed up on middle, down the track and worked to leg
he backs away outside leg, Sunny slips in the arm-ball. Defended back off an inside edge
pushed through, blocked back to the bowler, more convincing now
quicker on middle, he uses his feet and pats it back to the bowler
shortish, top-of-off line, punched to mid-off
banged in short and down leg, does not rise much, though. Haris gives this more respect and sinks under it
back of a length and outside off, Haris is up on his tippy-toes as he guides it down to third man with an angled bat. Neatly done
back of a length and around off, dabbed in front of point with an open face
back of a length again, tapped to mid-on for a quick single. It turns into a oh-so-easy single as the fielder fails to collect the ball cleanly
dug in short and climbs on the leg stump, he nurdles it behind square leg for one
dug in short and wide outside off, he rocks back and pulls it away to the right of midwicket
good length ball outside off, knocked in front of point with an open face
dragged short and wide outside off, he rocks back and cuts it past backward point
on a length and outside off, he drives it crisply behind point for successive fours. Beats the man in the deep again
back of a length, top of off line, dabbed in front of point
good length ball outside off, sliced to point
banged in short and outside off, he fetches the pull from there sends it through midwicket. The man from the deep runs across to his left, slides and limits it to two
slid outside leg as he sees Haris come down the track, Haris adjusts and clips it to deep midwicket
length ball outside off, down the track, he meets the pitch of the ball and lofts it beautifully over the long-off boundary
pushed to the covers
slid through on middle and leg, nudged to midwicket
straighter on the leg stump, whipped to right of mid-on
Haris skips out and punches a single down to long-on
good length ball around off, he employs soft hands and dabs it to the left of point
back of a length, turned to midwicket
pitched up and outside off, driven firmly past the covers. Sweeper cover (Mahmudullah) runs to his right, slides but can only parry it to the boundary
back of a length and outside off, punched to sweeper cover
on a good length and outside off, guided towards point
pitched up and outside off, driven into the covers, finds the fielder
straighter in line, clipped towards square leg
terrific strike from Haris. Shakib gives this air on middle, he nips down the track and lofts it over long-on
pushed through outside off, guided to short third man
back of a length and on middle and leg, punched to the left of the bowler, towards long-on
length ball on off, Nasim backs away, makes room and goes inside-out over the covers
slid through on middle, he shifts his balance on to the back foot and forces it down to long-on
good length ball on middle, pushed ram-rod straight, so much so that it hits the stumps at non-strikers' and deflects to mid-on
pitched up and outside off, driven to the right of the covers
back of a length and outside off, steered through the covers. Sweeper cover mops it up
back of a length and on off, patted in front of the covers. Nasir slides at the non-strikers', loses his balance, recovers and steals an extra run via overthrow
back of a length and comes in on middle, hit high on the bat. Lobs it to the right of the bowler, towards mid-on

Haris lobs it back to the bowler for a simple return catch. First wicket for Mashrafe in his 150th ODI. Haris throws his head back in despair. Good length ball outside off, slowy in pace at 112kph. Haris was early into the stroke, chipping it back to the bowler
back of a length and on off, he pushes and gets an inside edge onto the pad. It rolls to the leg side, he sneaks in a single for his maiden ODI fifty
good length ball outside off, he deliberately opens the face of his bat and runs it through the vacant slip cordon, very fine on the off side
good length delivery outside off, left alone
bumper at 138ks, he sinks under it. One for the over signals the square-leg umpire
fuller- length ball outside off, pushed back at the bowler. The umpire calls out Rubel for overstepping. Mash walks to the umpire and jokingly asks for a review
back of a length and outside off, he throws his bat at it and flashes it past the covers. Takes full toll of the free-hit
back of a length and around off, dabbed in front of point
Wahab is down the track, the bowler pulls his length back and pulls the pace off it. Beaten is Wahab
back of a length around off, turned in front of square on the leg side
fuller offcutter outside off, he aims to dab it away and gets beaten
banged in short and on off, he looks for a pull. Mistimes it over backward square leg. Two men converge but the ball drops into no-man's land
back of a length and outside off, punched to point
change of pace outside off, Wahab waits on it and bunts it in front of the covers for one
slides on with the arm on middle, poked to the covers
shortish and punched to the right of the bowler, who makes a half-stop. They steal a single as Shakib has a shy at the stumps and doesn't hit
half-tracker outside off, slapped to sweeper cover
flighted and outside off, driven to the covers
spins in a touch, slower through the air. Poked to leg side off an inside edge
flat and quick on off, punched to long-off
very full and on middle and off, squeezed to wide long-on for a couple. They take an extra run off an overthrow
length ball on middle and off, he takes a step forward, extends his arms and hoists it over mid-off. It is hauled back in
full toss outside off, driven down to long-off, they hustle across for a couple. The throw is wide and Mashrafe can't collect the throw cleanly
length ball on off, he takes a step forward and thrashes a drive to the covers
length on off, swiped away behind square leg off the inside half of the bat
fullish and outside off at 106kph as Mashrafe pulls the pace off it. Wahab waits on it and dabs it to the covers
whipped away off the pads through midwicket off the back foot
dug in short and rises on middle, he rocks back and top-edges the pull. It lands in front of long-on. Midwicket runs back, but can't get there either
fuller on middle, pushed to the leg side
dabbed to short third. Wahab wants a quick single but is sent back, he beats the throw
back of a length on the leg stump, punched to long-on
fuller on middle, he seeks to turn to leg. Gets a leading edge that pops in front of mid-off
drifting down leg, Wahab can't help it away. Off the pad and trickles to short fine
he backs away outside leg, Sunny follows him. Slashed to extra cover
he makes room outside leg, fires a near yorker, jammed to the off side
back of a length on middle and leg, pushed down to long-on
he backs away miles outside leg, Sunny is smart enough to follow the batsman, chopped to extra cover
darted down leg, wided
flatter on middle and leg, squeezed to mid-on
crackin' hit. This was on a length and on middle and off, he shimmies down the track and thwacks a drive between the covers and mid-off, whistles away to the boundary
very fuller and on middle and leg, dips on Nasim, chipped to the bowler
mighty full and outside off, drilled to the off side
slash and a miss to a length ball wide outside off, inside the tram-line
yorker dips in late on off, jabbed wide of the covers
fuller and on middle and off, he backs away a bit and drills another drive towards sweeper cover
yorker at the base of leg as Wahab backs away. He jabs his bat down and gets an inside edge to leg
Nasim makes room, darted on middle, carved to extra cover
dragged short and wide outside off, he backs away and riffles a cut it in the gap at the covers, sped away to the boundary
flatter and on middle and leg, goes for a slog-sweep and hits it to deep midwicket. Not middled
full toss outside off, he backs away and goes over the covers. They hustle for two, Sunny can't collect the throw cleanly
shortish and punched to the right of the bowler, who has a shy at the stumps and hits Nasim. He puts his hand up in apology straightaway. No harm done
on a length and outside off, it was in the thrashing zone. Wahab, who had backed away initially, can't connect
pitched up and outside off, Wahab connects. He bends his knee and pummels it through the covers. Taskin had missed the yorker
canny slower ball outside off at 108ks, Wahab is early into the slog and misses
another back-of-the-hand slower one outside off, Wahab swings and is beaten again
on a length and on off, hacked away to long-on
slowy short ball outside off at 103.3kph, he waits on it and cuts it late past a diving point
shortish and on the leg stump, Wahab steps out and slogs it to long-on off the inside half of the bat
shortish and rises on middle and leg, he steps away and cuts it uppishly over the covers
he shuffles across off, takes this length ball from there and short-arm pulls it to mid-on
short and wide outside off, cut to point
length on middle, Wahab sinks to one knee and slog sweeps it away to the cow corner boundary. Sabbir runs to his right at deep midwicket and slides in vain
and Wahab goes bang again! He uses his feet and slugs it over the long-on boundary. Superb connection
he steps out, takes it on the full and drives it to long-off
65.1mph slower one outside off, he is early into the slog and misses it entirely. The pair sneak in a bye
another of the slower balls, this one at 64mph, Nasim is early into the pull. Off the thigh and wanders to short third man
slower ball and Wahab muscles it away. Back of a length slower ball, Wahab rocks back and slams it over square leg. What a way to get to a fifty
slower one outside off, he bends down swings and misses, beaten by the extra bounce. Another bye
slower ball on middle and leg at 64.8mph, he steps out and picks it to Tamim at short fine off an inside edge

inn2.comm: pitched up and teasing Tamim outside off, he does not bite
good length ball outside off, he presses forward and pushes it to the covers
drifting down leg, wide called, Tamim can't meet with the attempted glance
back of a length and swerves back in to catch Tamim on the thigh pad as he does not meet with the flick
fractionally back of a length and angles in from outside off, Tamim draws his bat inside the line and lets it pass
on a good length and on off, Tamim is forward to block it solidly
Tamim charges down the track, Junaid drags his length back. Tamim's aggression pays off as he lashes it past the covers
back of a length and angling away just outside off, punched back to the bowler. Mis-hit
back of a length and angling away outside off, he flashes with his feet glued to the crease. Almost nicked that one off
banged in short on middle at 138.7kph, he hops up and fends it to the off side
on a good length and angling away outside off, he chases it and drives it between backward point and the covers. Square on the off and side and it skips away
he angles his bat on impact with this back-of-a-length ball outside off, steered to point
back of a length and skiddy on middle, whipped to long leg
banged in short and hurries on at 136.4kph, he aims for a pull and manages top edge over the keeper's head
back of a length and outside off, he exploits the pace of Junaid and steers it intentionally past slip. Delicately done
pitched up and angling in on the fourth-stump line, he plays a charming drive between the covers and mid-off. Full marks for timing and placement. That is three fours in a row
back of a length and angling in on middle, blocked to off

Junaid strikes. This was fuller and curling away outside off, Sarkar seeks to drive with his feet in cement. He can only feather it to Sarfraz, who moves to his left and snaffles it. Good retort from Junaid after being hit for three successive fours
good length around off, solidly blocked to off
back of a length outside off and has some extra lift on it, chopped towards covers
drifting onto the pads now, Tamim flicks it behind square on the leg side with ease
banged in shortish and outside off, he lets it fly through to Sarfraz
good length on off, patted to the covers

Sarfraz belts out a big appeal for caught behind. The on-field umpire says no. They ponder about a referral and decide against it. Banged in short, Tamim does not get hold of the pull. May have brushed the shoulder on its way to Sarfraz
poor ball, on the hips and this is duly put away to the long-leg boundary with a flick of the wrists
very full and straight, Mahmudllah opens his account with a flick of his own through midwicket
good length ball angled in on off, keeps low as well. Mahmudullah adjusts and blocks it
crunchhh! Overpitched and outside off, he reaches out and drives it in front of square on the off side, beautifully timed
back of a length, angled in, blocked off the back foot
good length ball comes in with the angle on off, blocked to mid-on from the crease
very full and angled in on off, pushed defensively to mid-on
very full and on the pads, Tamim leans across and flicks it away backward of square leg. Junaid runs across from long leg, slides but the ball wins the race
back of a length and angled in, pushed to mid-on
dragged short and wide outside off. Tamil fetches it from there and pulls it firmly over midwicket
a bit too full, Tamim whips it away past midwicket, the fielder in the deep can't cut that off. This is a fast start for the hosts
on a length and angling away outside off, change of pace, guided to deep third man
dug in short and sort of skids on off, Mahmudullah goes on the back foot to defend it to the off side
fullish and outside off, he comes forward, drives and finds point
pitched up and outside off, laced to the right of mid-off
back of a length and angled in, Tamim fends it carefully to the leg side
boings outside off, bouncer. Tamim yanks his head out of the way. Too high and wide called
pitched up and outside off, he drives it to the right of mid-off, picks up a single now. Alert running between the wickets
pitched up and comes in with the angle, Mahmudullah squirts it behind square on the leg side off an inside edge
back of a length, blocked back to the bowler
very full and outside off, driven to point
back of a length and hurries on top of off, blocked out to the covers
back of a length and outside off, he stands tall and punches it to the left of mid-off
sliding onto the pads, Tamim can't glance it away. Takes it on the front pad, but this was snaking down leg and they sneak in a leg bye
dug in on a shortish length outside off, he finds point with a punch
short again, Mahmudullah hangs back, gets on top of the bounce and solidly defends it in front of the covers
looped up on off with a hint of turn, driven to long-off
flat and quick on middle, he hunts for a slog sweep, off the inside part of the bat to square leg
fuller and on off, driven down to long-on for one
pushed through outside off, Tamim waits on it and steers it away past slip, exploiting the pace of Ajmal. Smartly done by Tamim
boom goes Tamim. He does not want Ajmal to settle down. Pitched up outside off, he jumps down the track and smashes it over the covers
Ajmal darts it short on off, Tamim does not want to hold back. Plays a cut, gets a thick outside edge past slip, runs away to the third-man boundary
back of a length and on middle, he is right behind the line to block it to mid-off
banged in short and angling across off at 140.3kph, Mahmudullah gets on top of the bounce and glides it away to deep third man
back of a length, angled in on middle, defended back to Wahab
Tamim runs down the track, this was short and wide outside off at 142.3kph, Tamim biffs it past the covers
whoa! Dug in short on middle, down the track again and flat-bats it past the bowler. Away she raced away to the boundary

fifty in 31 balls for Tamim. This was dug in short and wide outside off at 117.8ks, he takes it from there and pulls it over midwicket. The fielder leaps in vain. He marches to his fifty with three successive fours
nudged to midwicket
shortish and outside off, punched out to sweeper cover
fuller and on middle and leg, he hangs back and turns it to midwicket
pushed through outside off and spins away at 91ks, defended in front of point
straight roller on middle, paddled down to short fine, finds the fielder
picked away off the pads to the right of short fine
short and outside off at 140.4kph, Tamim pulls and only connects with thin air
bumper outside off at 141ks, he yanks his head out of the way. Sarfraz leaps to collect the ball. Wide called
shortish and just below the ribs, Tamim can't help it away and wears it on his body
angled down leg, Tamim does not want any of this
short and climbs on the leg stump, Tamim is up on his tippy-toes as he fends it in front of square on the leg side
good length ball angled across off, he hunts for a flashy drive and gets beaten
back of a length and angling away outside off, punched past the covers for one
134ks full ball on the pads, picked away to long leg
fuller from Ajmal, Tamim goes hard on the drive, manages an inside edge to leg
flat, back of a length on the hips, tucked in front of square on the leg side
pushed through and turns in on middle, he does not get hold of the flick and takes it on his front pad. May have been sliding down. It would have bounced over leg stump says Hawk-Eye
down leg, wided
paddled down fine for one
straighter and on middle, Tamim presses forward to offer a solid defence
on a length and on middle and leg, defended in front of midwicket
shortish and outside off, he punches and finds the man at point
back of a length, outside off again, punched towards third man with an open face
Wahab bangs it short and outside off, Tamim does not hold back. Pulls and top-edges it over the keeper, Wahab's pace assisted him there
bouncer from Wahab, Tamim runs down the track and is beaten on the hook
short and outside off, semi paddled and semi pulled to midwicket
Tamim nips down the track, he does not back down from the challenge. Pulls the short ball and finds mid-on. Mis-hit
first wicket on international return for Ajmal. This was tossed up and spins in to strike middle as Mahmudullah sinks to one knee and does not meet with the slog sweep
fuller and on off, he shuffles across and tucks it to midwicket
flatter and on off, blocked to leg
round-armish outside off, dabbed to the left of slip, diving save from Hafeez there
pushed through with some extra bounce, defended to slip again
fuller and on middle and leg, fended to short leg, Rizwan the man under the helmet
Wahab persists with the short stuff, Tamim hops up, takes it from there and pulls it over midwicket. Deep square leg runs across and cuts it off
shortish and rises on middle and leg, defended to short leg. Wahab has overstepped, belated call from the umpire
bumpy short ball rises over middle at 89mph, Mushfiq can't connect with the pull
on a length and outside off, pushed defensively to the covers
short on middle, Mushfiq is up on his toes to quell it back to the bowler
short on the leg stump at 136ks, blocked off the back foot
short (what else?), defended back to the bowler
sliding down leg, he only manages an inside snick that sneaks to short fine
pushed through fuller and on the pads, knocked wide of short fine leg
looped up and spins in, driven down to long-on
round-armed on middle, hurries on to Tamim, who was late to bring his bat down. Gets an inside edge that wanders away to leg
short and wide outside off, he switches his balance onto the back foot and cuts it to deep point
tossed up, tapped in front of square on the off side for a speedy single
bumper outside off, flies over the head of Tamim. Wide called
back of a length and on off, dropped in front of the covers. Tamim looks for a quick single, but has to retreat
Tamim rides the bounce of this short ball on middle and steers it to backward point
lifter on off at 133ks, Tamim hops up and defends it
Pakistan continue to pepper Tamim with short balls, he attempts a pull, toe-ends it over the keeper
Tamim nips down the track, Rahat drags his length back, it keeps low. Tamim swings and misses
good length ball outside off, dinked to deep third man with an open face
straighter on middle, milked down to long-on for a single
defended to short leg off the back foot
pushed through outside off, steered away to deep point
ample flight on middle, dead-batted by Tamim
Tamim works this leg-stump ball around the corner for one
fuller and on middle, Mushfiq sinks to one knee, unleashes a slog-sweep and sends it over deep midwicket. Terrific strike, he loves the slog sweep
on a length and outside off, punched to mid-off
on a length and outside off, dabbed down to deep third man
good length ball outside off, punched past the covers. Mid-off has it covered, they hustle across for a single
banged in short and climbs outside off, he leaps and cuts it uppishly over point. Wahab mops up in the deep
dug in short and on middle, Mushfiq twirls his wrists and drops it to the leg side
length ball outside off, dabbed towards short third man
flighted ball on middle, driven down to long-on for an oh-so-easy single
dropped short, turning away outside off, cut to point
very full on off, pushed back at the bowler, who dives across to his left and deflects it to the covers
dragged short with a hint of turn, rocks back and punches it to deep cover
fuller and on the stumps, eased down to long-off
full toss on off, whipped away to mid-on
shortish and on middle, Mushfiq swivels on the back foot and pulls it away behind square on the leg side
encore from Mushfiq! Fetches this short ball from outside off, shifts his balance onto the back foot and pulls it away to the midwicket boundary
Nearly chopped on. Back of a length and just outside off, Musfiq aims to cut, manages an inside snick that dribbles fine past the stumps
on a length and outside off, he waits on it and dinks it away to third man, soft hands
Tamim charges down the track, Rahat shortens his length outside off. Swing and a miss
Rahat attempts a slower one and drifts it down leg, wide
straighter in line, clipped to midwicket, straight to the fielder
tossed up on middle, flicked to right of mid-on
looped up outside off, driven to extra-cover
straighter on middle, clipped to mid-on
Tamim presses forward and drives it back at Azhar
shortish and raps Tamim on the back pad as he misses the flick
flighted and fullish outside off, driven down to long-off
back of a length, top-of-off line, punched into the covers off the back foot
he rides the bounce of this back-of-a-length ball and dabs it to third man

back of a length and angled in on middle from wide of the crease, hit on the knee-roll on the front pad. The on-field umpire shakes his head. Pakistan go for a review. No inside-snick on that as well. It would have just clipped leg stump says Hawk-Eye. Umpire's call prevails. Unsuccessful review for Pakistan
nudged towards short midwicket
fullish and angled in on a fourth-stump line, pushed down to mid-off
back of a length and on middle, clipped in front of deep square leg
flatter and on middle and leg, he jams his bat down and gets an inside-edge
spinning across off, he rides it and guides it to short third man
quicker and drifting spinning down leg, keeps low and beats Tamim. Runs away through the keeper's legs
looped up on off, patted in front of point
quicker and outside off, he flat-bats a drive past the covers, sends it whistling to the boundary. Azhar kicks the turf in anguish
pushed through outside off, steered fine on the off side. They run three
dragged short on middle, he rocks back and pulls it to deep midwicket
back of a length and on middle, turned to the leg side for one
leg-side wide
back of a length and hurries on middle, be brings his bat down and jabs it to leg
good length on off, he comes forward and blocks it back to the bowler
fuller and on off, pushed towards mid-off
back of a length and just outside off, dabbed into the covers
very full and outside off, he bends his knee and eases it to sweeper cover
tossed up and on middle, he comes forward to smother it
slid through quick on the leg stump, swept away behind square on the leg side
dragged short on middle, he rocks back and cuts it towards deep point
quicker and outside off, steered away to short third man
flat length ball on off, guided to short third man
tossed up, he shuffles across and laps it in the air to the left of the keeper. Long leg hunts it down
fuller and on middle and leg, clipped to midwicket
back of a length and attacking the stumps, blocked back to the bowler
stray ball down leg, Mushfiq tickles it away to the left of the keeper. Easy pickings, that
stump-to-stump line, he ventures forward and across as he defends it to mid-on
good length ball outside off, sliced in front of Fawad Alam at point. He fumbles and gives away a single
back of a length and outside off, chopped to the keeper as he does not get hold of the cut
quicker and outside off, turned to leg
extra bounce on this outside off, guided to short third man
quicker and on off, clipped backward of square leg

nicely looped up and spins away past the nervy push of Tamim. Sarfraz and Ajmal go up for a caught-behind appeal, not given. Pakistan do not have any reviews left to challenge the on-field decision.  No nick on that, daylight between bat and ball
poked out towards slip, the fielder mis-fields
flatter and spins away outside off at 93.8ks, gets a thick outside edge, beats short third man
fullish and outside off, driven into the covers
back of a length and rises outside off, he looks to glide it to third man, beaten on the outside edge. Wahab celebrates, appeals, the umpire does not budge
veering onto the leg stump, he can't glance it away. Off the pad and dribbles to leg
back of a length, angled away, he manages an inside edge onto the pad
back of a length and on middle, turned with the wrists through midwicket
bouncer outside off, Tamim sways away and lets it thud to Sarfraz
flatter and on off, nudged to short fine
aha, that's a doosra from a round-armish action, Mushfiq pokes and misses
dabbed with soft hands to the left of slip
floated outside off, tapped in front of point, they hustle across for a single. Tamim runs across, stumbles at the non-strikers' and nearly falls over
quicker and flatter, tucked towards deep square leg
fullish and Ajmal gives this more air on off, dabbed in front of point. No single, here
back of a length and on middle, blocked by Mushfiq
similar length and outside off, dabbed to the off side
back of a length and slanted across, past the outside edge of Mushfiq's waft
dug in on a back of a length and outside off, Mushfiq stands tall and punches it past backward point with an open face. He marches to his fifty
short and outside off, he swivels on the back foot and drags the pull off the inside half of the bat towards deep midwicket
low full toss outside off, he seeks to drive it through the covers, gets an inside edge to midwicket
floated and outside off, driven crisply to long-off for an ambled single
fuller and on middle and leg, nurdled through midwicket
shortish and on middle and leg, he milks another single backward of square leg
flat and quick on off, he squeezes out a drive to long-off
picked away off the pads behind square on the leg side
flighted on middle, blocked into the covers
back of a length, off the hips and dribbles to leg. Mushfiq wants a single, Tamim says no
Wahab errs in line, drifts it down leg, Tamim can't glance it away
good length around off, he comes forward and pushes it to mid-off
fuller and on middle and leg, he leans across and clips it to midwicket
swerves in very full on the pads, flicked away backward of square leg
he tucks this leg-stumpish ball to deep midwicket and raises the 100 partnership in 124 balls
back of a length and moves away outside off, Tamim seeks to guide it fine towards third man, but is beaten
dug in short on middle, Mushfiq rocks back and pulls it over midwicket. There is protection in the deep
extra lift on this length ball on middle, defended to leg
half-tracker and punished. Mushfiq moves onto the back foot in a flash and mauls a pull to the deep midwicket boundary
another short ball and he nails a pull to the deep midwicket fence again
tripe full toss on the leg stump, slog-swept away in front of square on the leg side for a one-bounce four
back of a length and on middle, cut away to point
near yorker on middle and leg, swings in, Tamim jabs his bat down and keeps it out
Successive centuries for Tamim, he is pumped. Too fuller and on the leg stump, glanced away fine. He has his hands aloft in celebration and then swings his bat vigorously in the air
fuller and on middle and leg, clipped towards deep midwicket
good length ball angled in on off, Mushfiq aims to drive through mid-off, manages an inside edge to leg
he dabs this in front of the covers and sets off for a single. Mushfiq reciprocated well
tucked away off the pads to deep backward square leg
shortish and angled across, extra lift on this foils Mushfiq's attempted dab to third man. Beaten

The second grab does it for Alam. Good length slowy ball angling away outside off at 119.2ks, he slices it to Fawad at point, who messes it up on the first attempt. But recovers and pouches it on the second. Mushfiq raises his bat and acknowledges the applause as he walks back. He was undone by the change of pace
dug in on a back of a length and outside off, slashed over backward point to third man
fuller on middle and leg, clipped through midwicket
angled in on off, patted into the covers
width on offer outside off, short as well. Shakib executes a cut and sends it scurrying past point
pitched up and outside off, he lays into a drive and flays it past the covers
shortish and outside off, dinked to point with an open face
Tamim runs down the track, manufactures a length ball and deposits it over long-on. Just wide of the sightscreen
bouncer outside off, Tamim jerks his head out of the way. Wide called, for there was too much height on this
low full toss on middle and leg, whipped away in front of square on the leg side
pitched up and outside off, tapped to extra-cover for one
dug in shortish and outside off, eased to third man with an open face. Scores are level
Bangladesh win, clinch the series, and make history. This is their first series win over Pakistan. Flatter and on middle and leg, nuggety nurdle behind square leg
